name: RANDOM Alignment Generator
description:
Originally, this was meant for an event on the RPG Maker forums, but I just missed it! So I decided to release this for S&Gs to the public and hope folks have fun with it.

This is a RANDOM Alignment Generator. You can choose either the regular vanilla alignment (Lawful Good, Chaotic Evil) or something crazy like Iced Lemon. The choice is yours!
